thread.title: Italy sells spectrum to Telecom Italia and Vodafone for 462 mln euros
thread.title_full: Italy sells spectrum to Telecom Italia and Vodafone for 462 mln euros

title: Italy sells spectrum to Telecom Italia and Vodafone for 462 mln euros
text:
Tip : Use comma (,) to separate multiple quotes. Learn more... 
Thu, Sep 10, 2015, 15:58 BST - UK Markets close in 32 mins. Italy sells spectrum to Telecom Italia and Vodafone for 462 mln euros Reuters - UK Focus – 2 hours 10 minutes ago TIAJF 0.00 
MILAN, Sept 10 (Reuters) - Italy has raised 462 million euros ($518 million) from the sale of spectrum to Telecom Italia (Other OTC: TIAJF - news ) and Vodafone that will be used for 4G mobile phone services. 
In a statement on Thursday, the country's industry ministry said Telecom Italia bought frequencies for 230.3 million euros and Vodafone for 231.9 million euros. ($1 = 0.8922 euros) (Reporting by Danilo Masoni; editing by Francesca Landini) Tax cuts, pensions, childcare, online accounts and beer duty, here's … Related Stock Articles Follow the quotes you care about most.
